Html:
Hello All,

I have used Microsoft Window Ribbon Control(Similar to Microsoft Office) in almost all the form that I have created. That works great but, now I have changed the design color(Applied some themes) of all the components that I have used. But I am not able to change the Default "Blue" color of the Ribbon Control which can be seen above the MenuBar.

In short, I want to change the BLUE COLOR SEEN AT THE TOP OF THE WINDOW.

How can I change that default color??
Could you post a screenshot?  I'm not sure which area you're referring to.  Thanks!
